name: Show_Recaptcha_Where_Nedeed
author: Ermald Billa

sections.description: This plugin ensures that Contact Form 7’s Recaptcha v3 only appears on pages with contact forms, improving performance and reducing unnecessary load.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/show-recaptcha-where-nedeed directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Show Recaptcha screen to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
How do I enable or disable the Recaptcha functionality?

Go to Settings->Show Recaptcha and use the checkbox to enable or disable the Recaptcha functionality.

short_description: This plugin fixes Contact Form 7's Recaptcha v3 so it only appears on pages with contact forms.
